channel.title: Cheese on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Cheese on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Build your Omelet (with cheese)
item.description: Mushroom, turkey bacon, sweet pepper, cheese, 1-Egg omelette served with 2 slices of toast: white or wheat.

item.title: Homemade Chicken Burger
item.description: This tender patty is made in-house and seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheese, pineapple, and a secret sauce

item.title: Homemade Lamb Burger
item.description: This juicy patty is made in-house and is seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheese, pineapple, and a secret sauce.

item.title: Specialty Omelette
item.description: Mushroom, turkey bacon, sweet pepper, cheese, 1-Egg omelette served with 2 slices of toast: white or wheat.

item.title: TT's Signature Lamb Burger
item.description: This juicy patty is made in-house and is seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheese, pineapple, jalape√±o, chili pepper, turkey bacon, caramelized onions, bacon jam and a secret sauce.
